item.text: For I want you to know how great a struggle I have for you, and for those in Laodicea, and for those who have not met me face to face.

My goal is <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st>, having been <st data-num="4822">knit together</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st>, may be <st data-num="3870" class="">encouraged</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> that<n id="3" /> they may have <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="4149" class="">riches</st> that <st data-num="4136" class="">assurance</st> brings in their <st data-num="4907" class="">understanding</st> of the <st data-num="1922" class="">knowledge</st> of the <st data-num="3466" class="">mystery</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, namely, <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>,<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="614" class="">hidden</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="2344" class="">treasures</st> of <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1108" class="">knowledge</st>.

I <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> <st data-num="3367">no one</st> will <st data-num="3884" class="">deceive</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">through</st> <st data-num="4086">arguments<n id="1" /> that sound reasonable</st>.<n id="2" />
For though I am absent from you in body, I am present with you in spirit, rejoicing to see your morale and the firmness of your faith in Christ.
Therefore, just as you received Christ Jesus as Lord, continue to live your lives in him,

<st data-num="4492" class="">rooted</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532">and</st> <st data-num="2026">built up</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532">and</st> <st data-num="950" class="">firm</st><n id="2" /> in your<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="2531">just as</st> you were <st data-num="1321" class="">taught</st>, and <st data-num="4052" class="">overflowing</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="2169" class="">thankfulness</st>.

Be <st data-num="991" class="">careful</st> <st data-num="3361">not</st> to allow <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> to <st data-num="4812" class="">captivate</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> an <st data-num="2756">empty</st>, <st data-num="539">deceitful</st> <st data-num="5385" class="">philosophy</st><n id="2" /> that is <st data-num="2596" class="">according to</st> <st data-num="444">human</st> <st data-num="3862" class="">traditions</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4747">elemental spirits</st><n id="3" /> of the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="4138" class="">fullness</st> of <st data-num="2320" class="">deity</st> <st data-num="2730" class="">lives</st><n id="1" /> in <st data-num="4985">bodily form</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you have <st data-num="1510" class="">been</st> <st data-num="4137" class="">filled</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st> over <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="746" class="">ruler</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st>.

<st data-num="1722" class="">In</st> <st data-num="3739">him</st> you <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> were <st data-num="4059" class="">circumcised</st>—<st data-num="886" class="">not</st>, however,<n id="1" /> with a <st data-num="4061" class="">circumcision</st> <st data-num="886" class="">performed by human hands</st>, but <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="555">removal</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="4561" class="">fleshly</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st>,<n id="3" /> that is,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722">through</st> the <st data-num="4061" class="">circumcision</st> done by <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.

Having been <st data-num="4916">buried with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="908" class="">baptism</st>, you <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> have been <st data-num="4891" class="">raised with</st> <st data-num="3739">him</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> your<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> in the <st data-num="1753" class="">power</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> who <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> even though <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st> <st data-num="1722">in</st> your<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3900" class="">transgressions</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> in the <st data-num="203" class="">uncircumcision</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st>, he nevertheless<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4806" class="">made</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4806" class="">alive</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, having <st data-num="5483" class="">forgiven</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="3900" class="">transgressions</st>.

He has <st data-num="1813" class="">destroyed</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3588" class="">what</st> was <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, a <st data-num="5498" class="">certificate</st> of indebtedness<n id="2" /> expressed in <st data-num="1378" class="">decrees</st> <st data-num="5227" class="">opposed</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>. He has <st data-num="142" class="">taken</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="142" class="">away</st> by <st data-num="4338" class="">nailing</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> to the <st data-num="4716" class="">cross</st>.
Disarming the rulers and authorities, he has made a public disgrace of them, triumphing over them by the cross.
Therefore do not let anyone judge you with respect to food or drink, or in the matter of a feast, new moon, or Sabbath days—

<st data-num="3739" class="">these</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> only<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="4639" class="">shadow</st> of the <st data-num="3195">things to come</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="4983" class="">reality</st><n id="2" /> is <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>!<n id="3" />

Let <st data-num="3367">no one</st> who <st data-num="2309" class="">delights</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5012" class="">false humility</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2356" class="">worship</st> of <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st> <st data-num="2603">pass judgment on</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st>. That person goes on at great lengths<n id="2" /> about <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> he has <st data-num="1687" class="">supposedly</st> <st data-num="3708" class="">seen</st>, but he is <st data-num="5448" class="">puffed up</st> with <st data-num="1500">empty notions</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">fleshly</st> <st data-num="3563" class="">mind</st>.<n id="3" />
He has not held fast to the head from whom the whole body, supported and knit together through its ligaments and sinews, grows with a growth that is from God.
If you have died with Christ to the elemental spirits of the world, why do you submit to them as though you lived in the world?

“Do <st data-num="3361">not</st> <st data-num="681" class="">handle</st>! Do <st data-num="3366" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1089" class="">taste</st>! Do <st data-num="3366" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2345" class="">touch</st>!”

<st data-num="3739">These</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1519">destined to</st> <st data-num="5356" class="">perish</st> with <st data-num="671" class="">use</st>, founded as they are<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2596" class="">on</st> <st data-num="444" class="">human</st> <st data-num="1778" class="">commands</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1319" class="">teachings</st>.<n id="2" />

Even though they have the appearance of wisdom with their self-imposed worship and humility achieved by an unsparing treatment of the body—a wisdom with no true value—they in reality result in fleshly indulgence.
